articles.description: Researchers from the Okinawa Institute of Science and Technology Graduate University (OIST) in Japan began a project titled "Sea Horse," which aims to harness energy from the Kuroshio ocean current that flows from the eastern coast of Taiwan and around the so…
articles.content:
Tokyo: Scientists have developed a new turbine that can harness energy from ocean currents to produce low-cost and sustainable electricity.
